content: wear it over your shoulders or it wrap it around your neck for this luscious crochet shawl stitched in beautiful caron blossom cakes you ll master the shell and cluster stitch techniques color is all your choice so make it as designed or imagine a custom look using your preferred shade it s a delicate layer that makes a great gift idea materials caron® blossom cakes™ 8 oz/227 g 481yds/440m macaw 37006 2 cakes or 740 yds/670 m measurements approx 26 x 75 66 x 190 5 cm excluding fringe
